short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hunter x Hunter Wallpaper turn new tab to HxH custom Hunter x Hunter background. Hunter x Hunter theme for Anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a shuffled Hunter x Hunter wallpaper.
2. Choose or favorite your Hunter x Hunter background via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick navigation to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing website shortcuts quickly.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Direct link to More Themes.
12. Easy options for sharing on social media.
13. Convenient access to download wallpapers.
14. Fast access to gaming.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Hunter x Hunter tab.
